ComicInfo.Penciller: Martin Coccolo,Uesugi Hikaru,Michael Allred,Hikaru Uesugi,Michael Allred,Hikaru Uesugi,Martin Coccolo
ComicInfo.Summary: ALL BLED OUT! The grand finale of DEADPOOL: BLACK, WHITE AND BLOOD includes a Chris Yost and Martin Coccolo story that must be seen to be believed (and even then, you still won't believe it)… …a story from the best-selling DEADPOOL: SAMURAI manga team, Sanshiro Kasama and Hikaru Uesugi… …and an ALL-RED ALLRED tale, written and drawn by Mike Allred!
ComicInfo.Writer: Christopher Yost,Sanshirō Kasama,Michael Allred,Sanshiro Kasama,Michael Allred,Sanshiro Kasama,Christopher Yost
ComicInfo.Title: Operation Payback!; Samurai Version; Cherry
